content: Nicely done! However, I noticed that none of your tests include any bracketed expressions. Don’t you think you should test if those work as expected too? Also, I’m guessing the calculator won’t work if you use an expression like (5*65) + 24, since this becomes 5*65* + 24. Was that by design? Also, regarding the writing of the article, I’d suggest you limit your discussion of side issues (such as version control), so you can explain the actual solution in depth without the article getting too long. You can instead link to a relevant article (by yourself or someone else) explaining the peripheral issues.
